stories.title: Biggest Software Flops of All Time
Contentrain is a new Headless CMS which provides easy integration with Jamstack

stories.text:
We are a startup crypto wallet who are making the most secure solution for mobile crypto storage. Gridlock is currently at a crucial stage of development and needs feedback from the market of potential users in order to progress in the right direction.

All you have to do is sit down with our app for 10 minutes and then partake in a short interview or written survey for us to collect data. We will not record you or require you to fund your Gridlock wallet. This is purely for optimization of UX and future enhancements!

Please email marketing@gridlock.network if you would like to help.
